name: Alicia
bio: Hey there! My name is Alicia and I am a web developer. On the weekends, you can probably find me at a coffee shop or at the gym.

name: Beatrice
bio: Hi everyone, Beatrice here. I've been a web developer for 2 years and I love my pet cat!

name: Chloe
bio: My name is Chloe and I am a UI designer. I am passionate about designing clean, streamlined application interfaces. Nice to meet you!
